description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Bubbles and Ballast. Being a description of life in Paris during the brilliant days of the Empire; a tour through Belgium and Holland, and a sojourn in London. By a Lady. [The preface signed: M. E. P. B., i.e. M. E. Parker Bouligny.]" Author: B., M. E. P. Contributor: BOULIGNY, M. E. Parker. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10106.ee.9." Page: 46 Place of Publishing: Baltimore Date of Publishing: 1871 Publisher: Kelly, Piet & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000158754 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
